name: CMTimeFlags
desc: A structure that defines the flags for a time value.

items.name: static var valid: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates a time is valid.

items.name: static var hasBeenRounded: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates a previous time calculation rounded the result.

items.name: static var positiveInfinity: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates the time is positive infinity.

items.name: static var negativeInfinity: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates the time is negative infinity.

items.name: static var indefinite: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates the time is indefinite.

items.name: static var impliedValueFlagsMask: CMTimeFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates the time is positive or negative infinity, or indefinite.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Cretes a new time flags value.
